page.title: 19Population In Inverbervie
page.content: We asked 164 families represented in the school to fill in a questionnaire. From the 118 returned we found that 14 families lived on farms, 47 in older houses, 57 in new houses. 52 families have come to stay here within the last 5 years, a further 34 within the last 10 years. While some residents had moved from S.Africa, Zambia, Middle East and U.S.A., 23 families had previously resided in England, the other newcomers coming from all parts of Scotland. At least 32 fathers were involved in oil related jobs, 22 were self employed while only 1 was unemployed. 10 mothers were employed full time while 43 had part time jobs working locally.
